collections.name: Ethereal Dream
collections.description: Inspired by the beauty of nature, this collection features flowing silhouettes and delicate fabrics that evoke a sense of serenity and dreaminess.

collections.name: Urban Edge
collections.description: A bold collection that fuses street style with high fashion, featuring oversized silhouettes, graphic prints, and edgy accessories.

collections.name: Timeless Elegance
collections.description: Classic designs with a modern twist, this collection features tailored pieces that are perfect for the sophisticated wardrobe.

collections.name: Bohemian Spirit
collections.description: A vibrant and eclectic collection that embraces individuality and freedom with colorful patterns and relaxed fits.

collections.name: Futuristic Visions
collections.description: This avant-garde collection pushes the boundaries of fashion with innovative designs and futuristic materials.

collections.name: Timeless Classics
collections.description: A refined collection of wardrobe staples that never go out of style, featuring versatile pieces for everyday wear.

collections.name: Sport Luxe
collections.description: A stylish blend of comfort and elegance, this collection redefines athleisure with chic designs suitable for both gym and casual outings.

collections.name: Ethnic Essence
collections.description: A celebration of traditional craftsmanship, this collection features intricate hand-embroidered pieces inspired by various cultures.

collections.name: Minimalist Chic
collections.description: This collection focuses on simplicity and functionality, featuring clean lines and neutral colors for a modern aesthetic.

collections.name: Glamour Nights
collections.description: A stunning collection of evening gowns and cocktail dresses that bring out the inner diva with bold colors and luxurious fabrics.

products.name: Classic Leather Jacket
products.description: The Classic Leather Jacket is a timeless outerwear piece that effortlessly complements any outfit. Crafted from high-quality leather, it exudes sophistication and style. This jacket is designed for versatility, making it perfect for both casual outings and more formal occasions. Its sleek silhouette and durable construction ensure that it will remain a staple in your wardrobe for years to come.
products.summary: A versatile and timeless leather jacket that pairs with any outfit.

productDetails.Crafted By: Skilled artisans with attention to detail.
productDetails.Care Instructions: Spot clean with a damp cloth, avoid prolonged exposure to direct sunlight.

products.name: Casual Chinos
products.description: These Casual Chinos are the perfect blend of comfort and style. Made from a soft, breathable fabric, they are designed for all-day wear. Their versatile look makes them suitable for everything from casual brunches to office settings. With a tailored fit and a range of colors to choose from, these chinos will quickly become a wardrobe favorite.
products.summary: Comfortable and stylish chinos for versatile everyday wear.

productDetails.Crafted By: Expertly tailored for a perfect fit.
productDetails.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low.

products.name: Slim Fit Jeans
products.description: The Slim Fit Jeans are a must-have for any fashion-forward individual. With a modern cut that hugs the body in all the right places, these jeans offer both style and comfort. Made from premium denim, they feature a slight stretch for ease of movement. Perfect for dressing up or down, these jeans are a versatile addition to any wardrobe.
products.summary: Trendy slim-fit jeans for a stylish and comfortable fit.

productDetails.Care Instructions: Wash inside out in cold water, hang to dry.

products.name: Sports Polo Shirt
products.description: Stay active and stylish with the Sports Polo Shirt. Made from a lightweight and breathable fabric, this polo is perfect for sports activities or casual outings. The classic design features a collar and a button placket, ensuring you look sharp while enjoying comfort. Available in various colors, it’s a versatile piece for any active lifestyle.
products.summary: Lightweight and breathable polo shirt for active lifestyles.

productDetails.Crafted By: Designed for optimal performance and comfort.
productDetails.Care Instructions: Machine wash warm, do not iron on the decoration.

products.name: Elegant Wool Sweater
products.description: Embrace warmth and sophistication with the Elegant Wool Sweater. Crafted from premium wool, this sweater provides exceptional insulation while remaining lightweight. Its classic design features a relaxed fit, making it ideal for layering or wearing alone. Whether you’re heading to a winter gathering or enjoying a cozy night in, this sweater is the perfect choice.
products.summary: Warm and sophisticated wool sweater for winter elegance.

productDetails.Care Instructions: Hand wash cold, lay flat to dry.

products.name: Classic Watch
products.description: The Classic Watch is a refined accessory that effortlessly blends style and functionality. Featuring a genuine leather strap and a minimalist dial, this watch is perfect for both casual and formal occasions. Its timeless design ensures that it complements any outfit, making it a must-have in every man's wardrobe.
products.summary: A stylish and refined watch with a leather strap.

productDetails.Material: Genuine Leather Strap and Stainless Steel Case
productDetails.Care Instructions: Wipe with a soft cloth; avoid water exposure.

products.name: Elegant Dress Shoes
products.description: These Elegant Dress Shoes are crafted from high-quality leather, offering a sophisticated look for formal occasions. With a classic design that features a sleek silhouette and a comfortable fit, these shoes are perfect for enhancing any formal outfit. Their durable construction ensures they will remain a staple in your wardrobe for years.
products.summary: Sophisticated leather dress shoes for formal occasions.

productDetails.Care Instructions: Clean with a damp cloth; polish regularly.

products.name: Stylish Backpack
products.description: The Stylish Backpack is designed for durability and functionality, making it ideal for travel and daily use. With ample storage space and multiple compartments, this backpack keeps your belongings organized while on the go. Its sleek design and comfortable straps ensure that you can carry it effortlessly, whether you're commuting or exploring new destinations.
products.summary: Durable and stylish backpack with ample storage.

productDetails.Features: Padded laptop compartment and multiple pockets.
productDetails.Care Instructions: Spot clean with mild soap and water.

products.name: Sporty Track Jacket
products.description: Stay active and stylish in the Sporty Track Jacket. This lightweight jacket is designed for sports activities, providing comfort and breathability during workouts. Its modern design features functional pockets and a zippered front, making it a practical choice for athletes and fitness enthusiasts alike. Perfect for layering, it’s a versatile piece for your active lifestyle.
products.summary: Lightweight and breathable jacket for sports activities.

productDetails.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold; tumble dry low.

products.name: Formal Blazer
products.description: The Formal Blazer is a sleek and sophisticated outerwear piece designed for formal events. Tailored for a perfect fit, this blazer is crafted from high-quality fabric that provides comfort and style. Its classic design features notched lapels and a single-button closure, making it a versatile addition to your formal attire, suitable for business meetings or evening events.
products.summary: Sleek and tailored blazer for formal occasions.

productDetails.Lining: Fully lined for comfort and style.
productDetails.Crafted By: Tailors with a focus on quality.
productDetails.Care Instructions: Dry clean only.

products.name: Beach Flip Flops
products.description: Experience comfort and style with our Beach Flip Flops, perfect for those sunny days by the sea. Designed for easy wear, these flip-flops feature a cushioned footbed and durable straps that provide all-day comfort. Whether you're lounging on the beach or taking a stroll along the shore, these flip-flops are the ideal companion for your summer adventures.
products.summary: Comfortable flip-flops ideal for beach days.

productDetails.Care Instructions: Rinse with water; air dry.

products.name: Sunglasses
products.description: Stay stylish while protecting your eyes with our Modern Sunglasses. Featuring a sleek design and UV protection, these sunglasses are perfect for any outdoor activity. The lightweight frame ensures comfort, while the tinted lenses provide clear visibility in bright sunlight, making them a must-have accessory for summer outings.
products.summary: Sleek sunglasses with UV protection for sunny days.

productDetails.Style: Fashion-forward design suitable for all occasions.
productDetails.Care Instructions: Store in a protective case; clean with a soft cloth.

products.name: Elegant Evening Dress
products.description: Make a statement at any formal occasion with our Elegant Evening Dress. This stunning floor-length gown features intricate detailing and a flattering silhouette that enhances your natural beauty. Perfect for galas, weddings, or upscale events, it is designed to turn heads and make you feel confident and beautiful.
products.summary: A stunning floor-length gown for formal occasions.

productDetails.Care Instructions: Dry clean only.

products.name: Floral Sundress
products.description: Embrace the sunny days with our Floral Sundress, featuring vibrant floral patterns that capture the essence of spring. This sundress is lightweight and flowy, making it perfect for casual outings, picnics, or beach days. With adjustable straps and a comfortable fit, it offers both style and ease for any warm-weather occasion.
products.summary: A vibrant sundress perfect for sunny days.

productDetails.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold; tumble dry low.

products.name: Denim Jacket
products.description: The classic Denim Jacket is a versatile staple for every woman's wardrobe. With its timeless design and comfortable fit, it can be paired with any outfit, from dresses to jeans. Made from durable denim, this jacket features a button-up front and pockets for added functionality, making it perfect for casual outings or layering during cooler evenings.
products.summary: A classic denim jacket for versatile styling.

productDetails.Fit: Regular fit with a slight stretch.
productDetails.Features: Classic button closure and chest pockets.
productDetails.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold; iron on low.

products.name: Leather Handbag
products.description: Elevate your style with our luxurious Leather Handbag, featuring a timeless design that complements any outfit. Crafted from high-quality leather, this handbag is not only stylish but also practical, offering ample space for your essentials. The elegant silhouette and durable construction make it perfect for both everyday use and special occasions, ensuring you always look chic and sophisticated.
products.summary: A luxurious leather handbag with a timeless design.

productDetails.Care Instructions: Wipe clean with a damp cloth.

products.name: High Waisted Jeans
products.description: Stay trendy and comfortable with our High-Waisted Jeans. Designed to accentuate your silhouette, these jeans feature a flattering high-waisted fit that pairs well with any top. Made from soft, stretchy denim, they provide both style and comfort, making them a versatile addition to your wardrobe for casual outings or a night out.
products.summary: Comfortable and trendy high-waisted jeans.

productDetails.Material: Cotton blend with a hint of stretch
productDetails.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold; tumble dry low.

products.name: Athletic Leggings
products.description: Achieve your fitness goals with our form-fitting Athletic Leggings. Perfect for workouts, these leggings are made from breathable, moisture-wicking fabric that keeps you comfortable during any activity. The sleek design and stretchy material provide excellent support and freedom of movement, making them ideal for yoga, running, or gym sessions.
products.summary: Form-fitting leggings perfect for workouts.

productDetails.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold; do not bleach.

products.name: Cashmere Sweater
products.description: Indulge in luxury with our soft Cashmere Sweater, perfect for cozy days. Made from 100% cashmere, this sweater provides unmatched warmth and comfort without sacrificing style. Its classic design and elegant fit make it a timeless addition to your wardrobe, suitable for layering or wearing on its own for a refined look.
products.summary: A soft cashmere sweater for cozy days.

productDetails.Care Instructions: Dry clean only; store folded.

products.name: Boho Earrings
products.description: Add a touch of flair to your outfit with our Intricate Boho Earrings. Designed with a unique bohemian vibe, these earrings are perfect for festivals, casual outings, or adding a statement piece to your look. Lightweight and easy to wear, they offer the perfect blend of style and comfort.
products.summary: Intricate earrings with a boho vibe.

productDetails.Care Instructions: Avoid exposure to moisture; store in a dry place.

products.name: Straw Hat
products.description: Stay stylish and protected from the sun with our Wide-Brimmed Straw Hat. Perfect for beach days or picnics in the park, this hat combines functionality with fashion. Its lightweight design and breathable material make it a comfortable choice for warm weather, while the wide brim provides ample shade and a chic look.
products.summary: A wide-brimmed straw hat for sunny days.

productDetails.Care Instructions: Spot clean with a damp cloth.

products.name: Winter Boots
products.description: Brave the cold in style with our stylish Winter Boots. Designed for warmth and comfort, these boots feature a sturdy sole for excellent traction and a cozy lining to keep your feet snug. Whether you're navigating icy sidewalks or enjoying a winter stroll, these boots provide both functionality and a fashionable edge.
products.summary: Stylish and warm boots for cold weather.

productDetails.Care Instructions: Wipe clean with a damp cloth.

products.name: Silk Scarf
products.description: Elevate your outfit with our luxurious Silk Scarf. This beautifully designed scarf adds a touch of elegance to any ensemble, whether worn around your neck, as a headband, or tied to your handbag. Made from 100% pure silk, it offers a soft, smooth texture that feels divine against the skin.
products.summary: A luxurious silk scarf to elevate any outfit.

productDetails.Care Instructions: Dry clean only.

products.name: Evening Clutch
products.description: Make a statement at your next event with our Stylish Evening Clutch. Perfectly sized to hold your essentials, this clutch features a sleek design with a stunning finish, adding the perfect touch to your evening attire. Whether for a wedding, party, or night out, this clutch will complement your look beautifully.
products.summary: A stylish clutch for evening events.

productDetails.Care Instructions: Spot clean with a damp cloth.
